entries.title: Most UFO reports ‘unremarkable,’ U.S. intel says, but analysis goes on
entries.description: More than half of 366 recent sightings of “unidentified aerial phenomena” appeared to be balloons, drones or common trash, a new report says.

entries.title: Max Verstappen wants to win Le Mans – virtually, that is
entries.description: Two-time Formula One champion Max Verstappen headlines this weekend’s 24 Hours of Le Mans Virtual, one of the world’s most high-profile sim races.

entries.title: Elon Musk breaks world record for ‘worst loss of fortune,’ Guinness says
entries.description: Musk, whose purchase of Twitter has put him under global scrutiny, lost his spot as the world’s richest person in December when the value of Tesla plunged.

entries.title: Tech companies want your kid’s birth date. Should you tell them?
entries.description: A Disney Plus request for the birth dates of its youngest users could be a sign of what’s to come as tech focuses on age verification.

entries.title: What space does to your body: Swollen heads, shrunken legs, round hearts
entries.description: Humans evolved in conditions of plentiful gravity and relatively little radiation. Space is the reverse — and it upends almost every system inside of us.
